concept.title: 1239.203-70 Information and communication technology accessibility standards - contract clause and provision.

conbody.p: (a) The contracting officer shall insert the provision at 1252.239-92, Information and Communication Technology Accessibility Notice, in all solicitations.
(b) The contracting officer shall insert the clause at 1252.239-93, Information and Communication Technology Accessibility, in all contracts and orders.
